languages.text: "Он — гордость семьи Эрэбис. Ее кровь. Ее суть. Мы счастливы, что он послужит вам так же, как мы служили Леди Теодоре".

traits.locale_text: "Маттис — гордость семьи Эрэбис. Ее кровь. Ее суть. Мы необычайно счастливы, что он сможет служить вам так же, как мы служили Леди Теодоре".

languages.text: "He is the pride of the Erebis family. Its blood. Its essence. We are delighted for him to serve you as we used to serve Lady Theodora."
languages.original_text: "Он — гордость семьи Эрэбис. Ее кровь. Ее суть. Мы счастливы, что он послужит вам так же, как мы служили Леди Теодоре".

traits.locale_text: "He's the pride of the Erebis family. Its blood. Its essence. We are delighted that he is going to serve you as we used to serve Lady Theodora."
"He's the pride of the Erebis family. Its blood. Its essence. We are delighted that he is going to serve you as we used to serve Lady Theodora."
"He is the pride of the Erebis family. Its blood. Its essence. We are delighted for him to serve you as we used to serve Lady Theodora."
"He is the pride of the Erebis family. Its blood. Its essence. We are delighted for him to serve you as we used to serve Lady Theodora."
"He is the pride of the Erebis family. Its blood. Its essence. We are delighted for him to serve you as we used to serve Lady Theodora."
"He is the pride of the Erebis family. Its blood. Its essence. We are delighted for him to serve you as we used to serve Lady Theodora."

languages.text: « Il fait la fierté de la famille Erebis. Il est son sang. Son essence. Nous sommes ravis qu'il soit à votre service, comme nous avons servi dame Théodora par le passé. »
languages.original_text: "He is the pride of the Erebis family. Its blood. Its essence. We are delighted for him to serve you as we used to serve Lady Theodora."

traits.locale_text: « Il fait la fierté de la famille Erebis. Il est son sang. Son essence. Nous sommes ravis qu'il soit à votre service, comme nous avons servi dame Théodora par le passé. »

languages.text: «Es el orgullo de la familia. Su sangre, su esencia. Estamos orgullosos de que le sirva como nosotros servimos a lady Theodora».
languages.original_text: "He is the pride of the Erebis family. Its blood. Its essence. We are delighted for him to serve you as we used to serve Lady Theodora."

traits.locale_text: «Es el orgullo de la familia. Su sangre, su esencia. Estamos orgullosos de que le sirva como nosotros servimos a lady Theodora».

languages.text: 「彼はエレビス家の誇りです。その血も、存在も。私たちがかつてシオドーラ様に仕えていたように、息子があなた様に仕えることを嬉しく思います」
languages.original_text: "He is the pride of the Erebis family. Its blood. Its essence. We are delighted for him to serve you as we used to serve Lady Theodora."

traits.locale_text: 「彼はエレビス家の誇りです。その血も、存在も。私たちがかつてシオドーラ様に仕えていたように、息子があなた様に仕えることを嬉しく思います」

languages.text: “他是伊雷比斯家族的骄傲，是家族的血脉与精华。我们很高兴他能为您效劳，正如我们以前为西奥多拉夫人效劳一样。”
languages.original_text: "He is the pride of the Erebis family. Its blood. Its essence. We are delighted for him to serve you as we used to serve Lady Theodora."

traits.locale_text: “他是伊雷比斯家族的骄傲，是家族的血脉与精华。我们很高兴他能为您效劳，正如我们以前为西奥多拉夫人效劳一样。”

languages.text: "Er ist der ganze Stolz der Familie Erebis. Ihr Blut. Ihre Essenz. Wir sind hocherfreut, dass er Euch dient, so wie wir Lady Theodora gedient haben."
languages.original_text: "He is the pride of the Erebis family. Its blood. Its essence. We are delighted for him to serve you as we used to serve Lady Theodora."

traits.locale_text: "Er ist der ganze Stolz der Familie Erebis. Ihr Blut. Ihre Essenz. Wir sind hocherfreut, dass er Euch dient, so wie wir Lady Theodora gedient haben."

languages.text: "O, Erebis ailesinin gururudur, kanıdır, özüdür. Tıpkı bir vakitler Leydi Theodora'ya hizmet ettiğimiz gibi onun da size hizmet etmesinden memnun oluruz."
languages.original_text: "He is the pride of the Erebis family. Its blood. Its essence. We are delighted for him to serve you as we used to serve Lady Theodora."
